UniprotID	Q9Y274
Accession	Q9Y274;B2RCH2;B3KMI1;D3DN39;F8W6U0
EntryName	SIA10_HUMAN
ProteinName	Type 2 lactosamine alpha-2,3-sialyltransferase (EC 2.4.3.6) (CMP-NeuAc:beta-galactoside alpha-2,3-sialyltransferase VI) (ST3Gal VI) (ST3GalVI) (Sialyltransferase 10)
GeneName	ST3GAL6 SIAT10
Length	331
Function	Transfers the sialyl residue from CMP-N-acetyl-beta-neuraminate to the terminal galactose residue on sugar chains of glycoproteins and glycolipids (PubMed:10206952, PubMed:26692484). It's alpha-2,3-sialyltransferase activity is specific toward type II glycan chains (Galbeta1-4GlcNAc) on glycoproteins and glycolipids such as neolactosides nLc4Cer and nLc6Cer, whose sialyl-products serve as precursors for the Lewis X antigen (PubMed:10206952, PubMed:26692484). Critically involved in the synthesis of functional selectin ligands needed for neutrophil recruitment during inflammation and lymphocyte homing to the lymph nodes (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
Disorder	0.0025,0.0030,0.0027,0.0020,0.0017,0.0015,0.0013,0.0013,0.0012,0.0015,0.0013,0.0012,0.0008,0.0004,0.0008,0.0012,0.0016,0.0014,0.0014,0.0016,0.0017,0.0015,0.0020,0.0020,0.0032,0.0037,0.0051,0.0073,0.0096,0.0163,0.0174,0.0188,0.0356,0.0780,0.0835,0.0463,0.0424,0.0398,0.0765,0.1137,0.1007,0.1229,0.1501,0.0749,0.0676,0.0631,0.0380,0.0372,0.0380,0.0178,0.0163,0.0184,0.0163,0.0101,0.0066,0.0083,0.0102,0.0108,0.0069,0.0065,0.0073,0.0083,0.0084,0.0084,0.0085,0.0083,0.0082,0.0134,0.0146,0.0138,0.0138,0.0148,0.0090,0.0181,0.0174,0.0306,0.0287,0.0380,0.0380,0.0835,0.0646,0.0719,0.0719,0.0414,0.0433,0.0443,0.0676,0.0372,0.0372,0.0356,0.0202,0.0463,0.0433,0.0424,0.0372,0.0389,0.0188,0.0253,0.0269,0.0136,0.0146,0.0188,0.0109,0.0205,0.0244,0.0240,0.0424,0.0294,0.0349,0.0244,0.0171,0.0294,0.0300,0.0306,0.0568,0.0356,0.0380,0.0835,0.0870,0.0799,0.1671,0.1007,0.0929,0.1671,0.1476,0.1501,0.1554,0.1528,0.1528,0.2164,0.2129,0.1881,0.1184,0.1092,0.0835,0.0909,0.1424,0.2164,0.2436,0.1643,0.1007,0.0985,0.1528,0.1643,0.1643,0.1759,0.1942,0.1914,0.1969,0.2951,0.2951,0.3704,0.3426,0.4409,0.3529,0.2849,0.1852,0.1942,0.2094,0.1823,0.1852,0.1643,0.1611,0.1702,0.1791,0.1028,0.0909,0.1449,0.1501,0.1671,0.1759,0.1759,0.1759,0.2224,0.1424,0.1399,0.2436,0.3019,0.1643,0.1501,0.1731,0.2328,0.3566,0.2680,0.2680,0.1449,0.1501,0.0948,0.0967,0.0531,0.0263,0.0191,0.0184,0.0184,0.0269,0.0263,0.0506,0.0506,0.0690,0.1373,0.0704,0.0300,0.0313,0.0300,0.0618,0.0483,0.0555,0.1028,0.1028,0.0531,0.0506,0.0870,0.1323,0.0765,0.0817,0.0443,0.0817,0.0414,0.0235,0.0223,0.0258,0.0253,0.0281,0.0165,0.0171,0.0157,0.0157,0.0205,0.0117,0.0202,0.0202,0.0209,0.0205,0.0102,0.0181,0.0168,0.0194,0.0104,0.0188,0.0306,0.0327,0.0313,0.0662,0.1323,0.2094,0.2034,0.2193,0.2575,0.2951,0.3910,0.2752,0.2680,0.3215,0.2224,0.3460,0.2292,0.1969,0.1528,0.1702,0.0870,0.0555,0.0494,0.0506,0.0320,0.0269,0.0163,0.0138,0.0120,0.0075,0.0074,0.0055,0.0078,0.0070,0.0078,0.0115,0.0080,0.0111,0.0130,0.0275,0.0281,0.0518,0.0424,0.0231,0.0205,0.0
